title: Box8 Coupons
title_desc: BOX8- Desi Meals is a made in India chain for Delicious Desi Meals Done Better food. With 75+ outlets across Mumbai, Ban...See moreBOX8- Desi Meals is a made in India chain for Delicious Desi Meals Done Better food. With 75+ outlets across Mumbai, Bangalore, Pune and Gurugram, we deliver meals in 38 minutes and serve late night till 1 AM. BOX8 has hence become ‘go to’ brand for the large population of young urban Indians living in metros, who eat out frequently, love authentic Indian meals, modern technology and convenience. Our menu includes 100+ dishes with categories including All-in-1 meals, Fusion Box, Biryanis, Paratha wraps, Sandwiches, Desserts, Ice Creams and more. See less
